name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Coso Para Administrar Audios de WhatsApp

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Coso Para Administrar Audios de WhatsApp

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sits pretty on the corner, scans WhatsApp conversations and picks up audio clips sent or received, adding them to a list for convenient handling.
Features a nice waveform of the audio, full seeking capabilities, auto-normalizing of volume, and queued reproduction of selected files.

Made for the benefit of a good friend. Only taking requests from him.
